this_title: Orion: The Man Who Would be King
introduction: ORION: THE MAN WHO WOULD BE KING tells the story of Jimmy Ellis, an unknown singer thrust into the spotlight as part of a scheme that had him masquerading as Elvis back from the grave. With a fictional identity torn from the pages of Gail Brewer Giorgio’s novel Orion, the backing of the legendary birthplace of rock ‘n’ roll, Sun Records, and a voice eerily similar to Presley’s, the “Elvis is alive” myth began. The story of Orion proves that fact is, indeed, ‘stranger than fiction.’ This is the story behind that story.
chinese_title: Orion: The Man Who Would be King
